text:
you can also add no_wrapper=true to modules to remove some of the additional elements that HubSpot wraps around modules eg

```{% inline_rich_text field="description" value="{{ module.description }}", no_wrapper=True %}```
HI Team, We have a one query regarding *3 active installs for app submission* - We don't know how to proceed that for submission , kindly can anyone share your solution to resolve this issue ?

Hi everyone, we have a HubSpot app that we are developing and we are trying to verify the domain by setting the txt record. However, it has been many days and it still has remain unverified. We have checked that the record is set correctly.
Has anyone ran into this issue? I can't get hold of HubSpot support either - the chat widget just spins.
